@AravindaRao07 Hi Aravinda, you can carry it in hand/check-in baggage. It needs to be properly packed and should be in a small container. If the ashes are carried in a bigger container, then the same has to be carried in the check-in baggage.

@tifosiindia Abhijit, please be informed that carriage of Electronic cigarettes, including all forms of Electronic Nicotine Delivery System (ENDS), E-Hookah, Vape are prohibited in hand baggage as well as check-in baggage.

data.text: @garg_varun08 Hi Varun, we don't have flights available for the mentioned sectors as of now. Please stay tuned with us for updates regarding new flights.

@akuiapaa As mentioned, there are no charges applicable. Kindly note that check-in counters will open 3 hours prior to departure and will close 60 mins prior to departure. Passengers are requested to report to the check-in counter at least two hours prior to departure.
@akuiapaa Further, there are no charges applicable on the issuance of a boarding pass at the airport. You can carry the luggage as per the permissible limit. 2/2

@akuiapaa Hi Samar, please note that web check-in is mandatory. Kindly proceed through check-in option on our website https://t.co/iQhxtfVkkj for web check-in. You can travel with mobile boarding pass which you will receive on your registered email id on completion of web check-in. 1/2
